entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
